trans-unit.source: BizTalk Transform
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Transform

trans-unit.source: Learn how to transform XML documents from one schema to another.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to transform XML documents from one schema to another.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Transform
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Transform

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: Put simply, the BizTalk Transform API App converts data from one format to another format.
trans-unit.target: Put simply, the BizTalk Transform API App converts data from one format to another format.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might take shipping and billing addresses from a purchase order and insert them into an invoice document.
trans-unit.target: For example, you might take shipping and billing addresses from a purchase order and insert them into an invoice document.

trans-unit.source: Or you may have an incoming message that contains the current date in the *YearMonthDay* format.
trans-unit.target: Or you may have an incoming message that contains the current date in the *YearMonthDay* format.

trans-unit.source: You want to reformat the date to be in the *MonthDayYear* format.
trans-unit.target: You want to reformat the date to be in the *MonthDayYear* format.

trans-unit.source: You can do this using the Transform API App in Microsoft Azure App Service.
trans-unit.target: You can do this using the Transform API App in Microsoft Azure App Service.

trans-unit.source: A Transform or a Map consists of a Source XML schema (the input) and a Target XML schema (the output).
trans-unit.target: A Transform or a Map consists of a Source XML schema (the input) and a Target XML schema (the output).

trans-unit.source: You can use different built-in functions to help manipulate or control the data, including string manipulations, conditional assignments, arithmetic expressions, date time formatters, and even looping constructs.
trans-unit.target: You can use different built-in functions to help manipulate or control the data, including string manipulations, conditional assignments, arithmetic expressions, date time formatters, and even looping constructs.

trans-unit.source: Maps are created in Visual Studio using the [Microsoft Azure BizTalk Services SDK](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=39087).
trans-unit.target: Maps are created in Visual Studio using the [Microsoft Azure BizTalk Services SDK](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=39087).

trans-unit.source: When you are finished creating and testing the map, you upload the map (.trfm) into the BizTalk Transform API App.
trans-unit.target: When you are finished creating and testing the map, you upload the map (.trfm) into the BizTalk Transform API App.

trans-unit.source: Additional features include:
trans-unit.target: Additional features include:

trans-unit.source: The transformation created in a map can be simple, such as copying a name and address from one document to another.
trans-unit.target: The transformation created in a map can be simple, such as copying a name and address from one document to another.

trans-unit.source: Or, you can create more complex transformations using the out-of-the-box map operations.
trans-unit.target: Or, you can create more complex transformations using the out-of-the-box map operations.

trans-unit.source: Multiple map operations or functions are readily available, including strings, date time functions, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Multiple map operations or functions are readily available, including strings, date time functions, and so on.

trans-unit.source: Can do a direct data copy between the schemas.
trans-unit.target: Can do a direct data copy between the schemas.

trans-unit.source: In the BizTalk Mapper, this is as simple as drawing a line that connects the elements in the source schema with their counterparts in the destination schema.
trans-unit.target: In the BizTalk Mapper, this is as simple as drawing a line that connects the elements in the source schema with their counterparts in the destination schema.

trans-unit.source: When creating a map, you view a graphical representation of the map, including seeing all the relationships and links you create.
trans-unit.target: When creating a map, you view a graphical representation of the map, including seeing all the relationships and links you create.

trans-unit.source: Use the **Test Map** feature to add a sample XML message.
trans-unit.target: Use the **Test Map** feature to add a sample XML message.

trans-unit.source: With a simple click, you can test the map you created, and see the generated output.
trans-unit.target: With a simple click, you can test the map you created, and see the generated output.

trans-unit.source: Upload existing Azure BizTalk Service maps (.trfm) and use all the benefits of the Transform API App.
trans-unit.target: Upload existing Azure BizTalk Service maps (.trfm) and use all the benefits of the Transform API App.

trans-unit.source: When you create the map, you don't need to add a schema.
trans-unit.target: When you create the map, you don't need to add a schema.

trans-unit.source: When your map is ready, add it to the Transform API App and you're ready to go.
trans-unit.target: When your map is ready, add it to the Transform API App and you're ready to go.

trans-unit.source: Includes support for the XML format.
trans-unit.target: Includes support for the XML format.

trans-unit.source: Download Schemas from Connector API Apps
trans-unit.target: Download Schemas from Connector API Apps

trans-unit.source: You can download the XML schemas for connectors such as SQL, SAP and SharePoint from the API App summary page.
trans-unit.target: You can download the XML schemas for connectors such as SQL, SAP and SharePoint from the API App summary page.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to download XML schemas for a specific SAP Connector API App, browse for the API App and open the summary page.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you want to download XML schemas for a specific SAP Connector API App, browse for the API App and open the summary page.

trans-unit.source: Select **Download Schemas** and a zip file with all the schemas corresponding to the SAP actions is downloaded to your computer.
trans-unit.target: Select **Download Schemas** and a zip file with all the schemas corresponding to the SAP actions is downloaded to your computer.

trans-unit.source: You can use the schemas to author a map (.trfm) in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: You can use the schemas to author a map (.trfm) in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Create and Add the Map
trans-unit.target: Create and Add the Map

trans-unit.source: Transforms or Maps are created in Visual Studio using the [Microsoft Azure BizTalk Services SDK](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=39087), which is a free download.
trans-unit.target: Transforms or Maps are created in Visual Studio using the [Microsoft Azure BizTalk Services SDK](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=39087), which is a free download.

trans-unit.source: For help creating a Map, see [Create a Map in Visual Studio](http://aka.ms/createamapinvs).
trans-unit.target: For help creating a Map, see [Create a Map in Visual Studio](http://aka.ms/createamapinvs).

trans-unit.source: After the map is created and ready for production, you can add the Map (.trfm file) to the BizTalk Transform API App you created in the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: After the map is created and ready for production, you can add the Map (.trfm file) to the BizTalk Transform API App you created in the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: If the map changes or is modified after it is uploaded, you can upload the updated map and it replaces the existing map in the Transform API App.
trans-unit.target: If the map changes or is modified after it is uploaded, you can upload the updated map and it replaces the existing map in the Transform API App.

trans-unit.source: Select **Browse** on Azure Management Portal (left of the screen) and select **API Apps**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Browse** on Azure Management Portal (left of the screen) and select **API Apps**.

trans-unit.source: If **API Apps** isn't displayed, select **Everything**, and select **API Apps** from the available list:
trans-unit.target: If **API Apps** isn't displayed, select **Everything**, and select **API Apps** from the available list:

trans-unit.source: The list of all **API Apps** created in your Azure subscription is shown:
trans-unit.target: The list of all **API Apps** created in your Azure subscription is shown:

trans-unit.source: Select the BizTalk Transform API App you created in the previous section.
trans-unit.target: Select the BizTalk Transform API App you created in the previous section.

trans-unit.source: The configuration blade for the API App opens.
trans-unit.target: The configuration blade for the API App opens.

trans-unit.source: You can see **Maps** in the Components section:
trans-unit.target: You can see **Maps** in the Components section:

trans-unit.source: Select **Maps** to open the new blade with the list of maps.
trans-unit.target: Select **Maps** to open the new blade with the list of maps.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Add Map** icon on the top to open the **Add Map** blade:
trans-unit.target: Select the **Add Map** icon on the top to open the **Add Map** blade:

trans-unit.source: Select the File icon and browse for a map file (.trfm) from your local computer.
trans-unit.target: Select the File icon and browse for a map file (.trfm) from your local computer.

trans-unit.source: Select **OK** and a new map is created.
trans-unit.target: Select **OK** and a new map is created.

trans-unit.source: It is shown in the list of maps.
trans-unit.target: It is shown in the list of maps.

trans-unit.source: Use a BizTalk Transform API App in a Logic App
trans-unit.target: Use a BizTalk Transform API App in a Logic App

trans-unit.source: Once the map has been authored and tested, it is now ready for consumption.
trans-unit.target: Once the map has been authored and tested, it is now ready for consumption.

trans-unit.source: Within the Logic App, BizTalk Transform is available in the gallery to the right.
trans-unit.target: Within the Logic App, BizTalk Transform is available in the gallery to the right.

trans-unit.source: Select **BizTalk Transform Service** from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: Select **BizTalk Transform Service** from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: The Transform is added to the flow:
trans-unit.target: The Transform is added to the flow:

trans-unit.source: Select the **Transform** action.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Transform** action.

trans-unit.source: The input parameters are displayed:
trans-unit.target: The input parameters are displayed:

trans-unit.source: Enter the following parameters to complete the **Transform** action configuration:
trans-unit.target: Enter the following parameters to complete the **Transform** action configuration:

trans-unit.source: Input XML
trans-unit.target: Input XML

trans-unit.source: Enter the valid XML content that conforms to the source schema of a map in Transform API App.
trans-unit.target: Enter the valid XML content that conforms to the source schema of a map in Transform API App.

trans-unit.source: This can be an output from a previous action in Logic App such as ‘Call RFC – SAP’ or ‘Insert Into Table – SQL’.
trans-unit.target: This can be an output from a previous action in Logic App such as ‘Call RFC – SAP’ or ‘Insert Into Table – SQL’.

trans-unit.source: Map Name (optional)
trans-unit.target: Map Name (optional)

trans-unit.source: Enter a valid map name that is already uploaded in your Transform API App.
trans-unit.target: Enter a valid map name that is already uploaded in your Transform API App.

trans-unit.source: If no map is entered, the map is automatically selected based on the source schema to which the input XML conforms to.
trans-unit.target: If no map is entered, the map is automatically selected based on the source schema to which the input XML conforms to.

trans-unit.source: The output of the action 'Output XML' can be used in subsequent actions in your Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: The output of the action 'Output XML' can be used in subsequent actions in your Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
